记录一个使用redisson的异常，其实是集群没有配置好
Can't connect to master: redis://172.28.85.145:6373 with slot ranges: [[10923-16383]]

[root@mrl data]# cat nodes-6371.conf
089b52b7696c0c95e9a7441ae1d6ed44b8f46084 47.115.138.120:6376@16376 slave 41b4f8f7d7183901394990fc82acd230821d87fc 0 1609075797000
3 connected
41b4f8f7d7183901394990fc82acd230821d87fc 47.115.138.120:6373@16373 master - 0 1609075798670 3 connected 10923-16383
1ca514c4f8aa9828649699d38499b91497746238 47.115.138.120:6375@16375 slave 5c062f874e8e901c27dd0a8cdba21cf1e2201d0c 0 1609075798000
2 connected
5c062f874e8e901c27dd0a8cdba21cf1e2201d0c 47.115.138.120:6372@16372 master - 0 1609075797667 2 connected 5461-10922
b9e81ddab04d3a7fa18c9f0156084d3cde8d6ecd 47.115.138.120:6374@16374 slave bdb31d14876477dbc021675855b9e334059e210d 0 1609075799170
1 connected
bdb31d14876477dbc021675855b9e334059e210d 172.28.85.145:6371@16371 myself,master - 0 1609075797000 1 connected 0-5460
vars currentEpoch 6 lastVoteEpoch 0

可以发现 除了myself是内网地址，其他都是公网ip;
所以停机，执行fix.sh 将nodes-*.conf的172.28.85.145内网ip替换为47.115.138.120公网ip，然后重启ok;
